title: BRIEF-Astrazeneca Announces Renewed U.S. Recommendation, Availability Of Flumist Quadrivalent Vaccine
text: February 21, 2018 / 8:42 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-Astrazeneca Announces Renewed U.S. Recommendation, Availability Of Flumist Quadrivalent Vaccine Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - AstraZeneca PLC: * ASTRAZENECA ANNOUNCES RENEWED RECOMMENDATION AND AVAILABILITY OF FLUMIST QUADRIVALENT VACCINE IN THE US * ASTRAZENECA - RESULTS DEMONSTRATED NEW 2017-2018 H1N1 LAIV POST-PANDEMIC STRAIN PERFORMED BETTER THAN 2015-2016 H1N1 LAIV POST-PANDEMIC STRAIN​ * ASTRAZENECA - CDC‘S ADVISORY COMMITTEE ON IMMUNIZATION PRACTICES VOTED IN FAVOR OF RENEWED RECOMMENDATION FOR FLUMIST QUADRIVALENT USE IN U.S. 2018-2019 SEASON Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
